channel.title: in my car on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in in my car on Tobyblog

item.title: Liver and Gizzards Review, with Sriracha Whoopie Pies
item.description: My buddy Brian Hammons over at Review the World requested another video food review, so I though I’d introduce him to a down-home treat from my childhood. I hope you’re happy with the results. I’m not gonna lie, this one is a bit of a deep dive; a little something for my hardcore devotees. That is, people that like watching me eat stuff in my car. And yes, I manage to add yet another stain to my car seat.

item.title: "Toe 2 Toe" Review: Chili Cheese Fries
item.description: THE CONTENDERS: Melter’s (Irving) melty burgers and loaded baked potatoes14 year old native Dallas establishment2 locations, downtown Dallas & Irvinglow key atmosphere with an emphasis on the food vs.Burger Fi (Garland)upscale burgers and hot dogsFlorida chain with scores of locations around the country50s/60s diner aestheticthick, home-cut fries and real angus beef MELTERS Melters’ chili cheese fries were the first and, so far, only thing I’ve had off of their menu, but I’m already impressed with the place.

item.title: Zyka Indian Food Review
item.description: I review some Indian food from my car.
